name: Jacob Woodford
coverLetter: I've been trimming for the past 2 years, and have some experience previous to that. I can trim roughly a pound of outdoor a day. I have experience with bucking down plants to trim, as well as with fine trimming. I am a college student so I am not available for work Monday-Thursday, but I can work all day Friday through Sunday. I am a hard and honest worker, with a high appreciation for the work I'm doing. I look forward to hearing back from you!
contact: You can contact me by email at jacob.w.woodford@gmail.com
